name: dfu-test-mobile
description: A test application for use OTA DFU on nordic nRF52 device

scripts.build-cordova: npm run webpack && cd mobile && cordova prepare && cordova build && cd ..
scripts.build-cordova-android: npm run webpack && cd mobile && cordova build android && cd ..
scripts.build-cordova-ios: npm run webpack && cd mobile && cordova prepare && cordova build ios && cd ..
scripts.webpack: npm run sass && webpack --config webpack.config.js && npm run copy-res && npm run copy-img
scripts.add-android: cd mobile && cordova platform add android && cd ..
scripts.add-ios: cd mobile && cordova platform add ios && cd ..
scripts.remove-android: cd mobile && cordova platform rm android && cd ..
scripts.remove-ios: cd mobile && cordova platform rm ios && cd ..

author: Colin Marley
